column4: How can I control USB Devices if Ubuntu is reading them correctly?
read to do what? like lsusb?
Well I did lsusb and my device is listed (a quickcam) but I am wondering how I can control it now
lsusb is recognizing my USB device, but I have no way of controlling it...It's a webcam, I am looking to see if I can't use it for AIMing....
